name: sgpyoga-website
description: SGP Yoga website with multilingual support

scripts.build:blog: cd blog && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p _site/blog && cp -r *.html robots.txt sitemap.xml css js assets locales es _site/ && cp -r blog/dist _site/blog/
scripts.build: npm run build:i18n && npm run build:blog && npm run build:copy
scripts.watch:i18n: node build-i18n.js && echo 'Watching for changes... (Ctrl+C to stop)' && fswatch -o index.html about.html classes.html events.html locales/ | xargs -n1 -I{} node build-i18n.js

author: SGP Yoga
